message.content: {"given_definition_quality":95,"better_definition":"happy; glad","sentence":"我很高兴。","image_prompt":"A simple scene in a soft apocalypse animation style showing a smiling person with a joyful expression, standing alone with gentle, pastel colors in the background, evoking calmness and happiness.
